tasks.setup_datasets: dataset init my_objects.ds 'sqlite://collection.db' ; dataset init test_dataset.ds 'sqlite://collection.db'
tasks.test: dsquery test_dataset.ds 'delete from test_dataset' ; deno test --allow-net dataset_test.ts
tasks.demo: dsquery my_objects.ds "delete from my_objects where _key = 'object_key_three'" >/dev/null ; deno run --allow-net demo_ts_dataset.ts
